analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
hetu hetu sampayutta duka kusala ttika

original: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva hetu sampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava

original: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva hetu sampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava

original: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayutto ca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva hetu sampayuttassa

original: ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare
analyzed: ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare

original: samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.
analyzed: samanantare upanissaye nava kamme tīṇi natthiyāḥ vigate nava
